headline: Catholics Must Hold Joe Biden and Every Catholic Politician Who Supports Abortion Accountable
author: Brian Burch
sentences: And not just for Joe Biden, but for every Catholic member of Congress and the U.S. Senate – including those who just voted for the most extreme abortion law ever introduced.

Moments ago a reporter from EWTN asked Joe Biden:
“As a Catholic, how do you support abortion, defying Church teaching?”
Biden was flustered.

He said: “I tell you what, I don’t want to get into a debate with you about theology.”
This… on Ash Wednesday… with ashes on his forehead!
Yesterday the powerful Susan B. Anthony List announced a massive new ad campaign in Arizona focused on “Catholic” Senator Mark Kelly.

Click here to sign up for pro-life news alerts from LifeNews.com
But we’re not done.
And Kelly is considered one of the most vulnerable Senators seeking re-election.
Don’t forget Kelly just voted for the extreme abortion bill on Monday.
CatholicVote is helping fund a portion of this campaign.
LifeNews Note: Brian Burch is the head of CatholicVote.
We’ve already committed $100,000 to this campaign.
We have to hold our elected officials accountable.
And we’ve got more ads planned in other states.
Thankfully, that law failed by a vote of 48-46.
Catholics have to fight for what we believe.
The question is an excellent one.
